main.name: Saikrishna, Vinnakota
main.description: with extensive knowledge of web and enthusiasm to learn upcoming technologies
main.bio: I have key skills in usability, accessibility, cross platform browser issues, advanced CSS based design, responsive design, mobile sites and user interface design using a range of web technologies. I have experience with variety of databases such as MySQL, NoSQL (MongoDB, DynamoDB etc). With a DevOps mindset, I have experience with Amazon Web Services(AWS) and deployed several projects over EC2 instances, managed S3 buckets and possess knowledge to define data processing and governance pipeline using S3, SQS, SNS, EC2, Lambda, EMR, Redshift etc. Experience with large scale complex projects and Experience in design / architecture of new solutions and knowledge of API integration, data cleansing, filtering etc. and having good understanding about related challenges.

education.degree: Masters in Management and Information Systems

work.title: Front End Engineer
work.description: Developing a Hospice Application for agencies which provide Hospice for Terminally Ill Patients, which involved Creation Schedule Center which uses Full Calendar to display Patient and Employee Schedule. Developed messaging center which integrates with application and uses Signal R, Created components and build Form Builder to documents visits which are reused throughout the application. Worked on Missed Visit and Visit Exports for submission on both Front End and Server side. Introduced Unit Testing with Jest and integrated with Aurelia and Team city, which reduced bugs by 60%. Worked with ASP.NET Entity framework and develop new components with Agile Methodology and Optimized load times of application by chunking, CSS minification and other techniques by 70%.

work.title: Billing Data Analyst
work.description: Successfully developed a Dashboard application to monitor the status of all metrics based on existing reports. Created Tableau Dashboards with interactive views, trends and drill downs along with user level security. Provide guidance in maximizing the potential of SharePoint and Tableau as it relates to company KPI.

work.title: Information Technology Tutor
work.description: The Role involved in overseeing the co-ordination of issues; change control, risks, documentation and any other logs that need control in projects associated with University and Students. Performed reviews, Audits, compliance, health checks, and configuration management were also performed in projects demanding the same. Ensured Good practice which reflect the method, standard, process, tools of project management and procedures that team needs to work efficiently.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developed Website using Blaze Templates, Meteor JS and Mongo DB and deployed over Amazon Web Services platform. Further, Incorporated Design techniques to solve business problems related to Website, and communicated these solutions to executive stakeholders. Performed ETL and migrated of data from Mongo DB to Redshift on AWS to incorporate a snowflake staging data model for staging using Pentaho data integration tool.

work.title: Programmer Analyst
work.description: Being the first Company I've been associated with, it has been a great experience through which i learnt a lot. Working for multiple projects of diverse domains, the extensive knowledge and expertise the company offers, is a class apart. Primary technologies used are HTML, CSS and OO JavaScript written using Closure. I make extensive use of progressive enhancement and responsive design techniques. Used to working under a high-pressured environment developing sites for coordinated application launches.
